criteria: Demonstrates understanding of diversity and inclusion.
Supports and respects individuals with differences.
Demonstrates empathy and compassion towards others.
descriptions: Shows no understanding of diversity or inclusion; may exhibit disrespectful behavior or language.
Demonstrates minimal awareness of diversity and inclusion; may use stereotypes or insensitive language.
Acknowledges diversity and inclusion but lacks a deeper understanding; language may be respectful but superficial.
Understands and appreciates diversity and inclusion; uses respectful language and avoids stereotypes.
Actively promotes diversity and inclusion; challenges stereotypes and advocates for equity.
Serves as a role model for diversity and inclusion; demonstrates exceptional empathy and understanding, and actively works to create an inclusive environment.
Actively excludes or disrespects individuals with differences.
Shows discomfort or indifference towards individuals with differences; may engage in passive exclusion.
Tolerates individuals with differences but does not actively support or respect them.
Treats individuals with differences with basic respect and courtesy; avoids discriminatory behavior.
Actively supports and respects individuals with differences; stands up against discrimination and prejudice.
Champions the rights and dignity of individuals with differences; actively works to create a welcoming and inclusive environment for all.
Shows no empathy or compassion towards others; disregards their feelings and experiences.
Demonstrates limited empathy or compassion; may struggle to understand others' perspectives.
Acknowledges others' feelings but lacks a deeper understanding; may offer superficial support.
Demonstrates empathy and compassion towards others; attempts to understand their perspectives and offer support.
Actively seeks to understand others' perspectives and offers meaningful support and compassion.
Consistently demonstrates exceptional empathy and compassion; goes above and beyond to support and uplift others, creating a culture of kindness and understanding.
